name: object-describe
description: A way to inspect the entire type hierarchy of an object, including properties inherited (and potentially overridden) from its prototype chain.

scripts.test:dev: node -r esm test/index.js | tap-notify | tap-diff; exit 0;
scripts.test:watch: find . -name '*.*js' | grep -v node_modules/ | grep -v dist/ | entr npm run test:dev
scripts.test:browser: npm run build && cp test/tests.html dist/ && open dist/tests.html
scripts.pre-flight: npm run format && npm run test
scripts.docs: npm run build && documentation build src/*.*js --config documentation.json --format html --output docs/ && rm -rf docs/example && cp -R marklogic-describe/public docs/example
scripts.Xpostdocs: curl --digest -u admin:admin http://localhost:8642/sandbox/index.sjs?format=html > docs/example.html && cp src/sandbox/object-describe.css src/sandbox/ui.js docs/

author: Justin Makeig <jmpublic+github@makeig.com> (https://github.com/jmakeig)
